tool_description: An api for the latest moon infos/news worldwide
name: Moon Phases News
title: Moon Phases News

api_list.name: Get Individual Moon info Source News
api_list.description: Get moon information from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://moon-phases-news.p.rapidapi.com/moonnews/timeanddate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moon-phases-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://moon-phases-news.p.rapidapi.com/moonnews/{mooninfopaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moon-phases-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Moon Info
api_list.description: **This endpoint will return back all information about moon/moon phases/moon every day.**
